cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our 6 Bed Mix Dorm has 3 capsule bunk bed. Provided is clean, fresh linen, and free unlimited WiFi, Airconditioning, and the ultimate comfort with our newly refurnished pod beds complete with personal fans, light and usb charging point.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: 6 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our 6 Bed Mix Dorm has 3 capsule bunk bed with bathroom. We provide clean, fresh linen, and free unlimited WiFi, Airconditioning, and the ultimate comfort with our newly refurnished pod beds complete with personal fans, light and usb charging point.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Basic 4 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our FEMALE ONLY 4 Bed Dormitory has 2 capsule king single bunk beds. We provide clean, fresh linen free unlimited WiFi, Airconditioning, and the ultimate comfort with our newly refurbished pod beds complete with personal fans, light and usb charging point

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: small and cosy this single bed 1 guest only room is the perfect budget friendly choice for a little privacy. including wifi, AC, fresh linen, lamp and clothes hanging space.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 10th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 10th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
